article:
The sun is shining and it's very hot. _ many people don't want to go out after _ . Mrs West has to  _ meet her father at the airport. Her father doesn't feel well, he wants to see a _ in the city hospital.
Now she's walking in the street. There _ no trees and she feels very _ . But she's too _ and can't walk fast . Suddenly she finds  a _ walking behind her. She gets angry and her face turns red. "Why are you walking behind me, boy?" She asks strictly. "It's cooler". The boy answers.
